text: The teachers are quite supportive and I had a really awesome English teacher who helped me improve from AL4~5 to AL1. This is really nice but one thing they can improve on is the bullying as I had been bullied by a boy on several occasions. Overall still a four star ü•∞
I had a great experience here in bukit timah, played in nsg, became an exco prefect,made many friends got a decent psle score of 13. Probably the most kind and caring teachers ive ever had.
This was my primary school, I graduated in 2023! I loved the precious memories that I've made during my time in btps
Everyone here is friendly, just don't make bad relationships with people in the school. Enjoy your life in btps. Teachers are very helpful and students here are very positive.
